81009.content:
@moukie#80773 

Ovo bi trebalo funkcionirati
```
cross join lateral regexp_split_to_table(film.title,  '\y') r(word) 
where levenshtein(lower(word),  'flintstons') <= 2
```

81546.content:
@behappy98#81064 

Meni ti je zadatak ovakav:

Ispisati godinu (datuma rental.rental_date) i naslov filma te iznos zara캠en iznajmljivanjem primjeraka filma u toj godini. Dodatno ispisati rang filma obzirom na iznos zarade u toj godini (primijetite da u svakoj godini postoji film s rangom 1).

U obzir uzeti samo filmove koji bilo u nazivu bilo u opisu sadr쬰 rije캜 캜iji je normalizirani oblik 'happi'. Donja tablica ilustrira izgled rezultata.

I ovo je rjesenje, mislim da bis po ovome mogao to samo prepravit za svoje potrebe.

![](assets/2020-10-18/00027.png)

81878.content:
@DuckItUp#80988 Jesi mo쬯a sku쬴o u 캜emu je problem?

EDIT: evo taman sam uspio nekako napikat rje코enje koje radi

```sql
select distinct 
title as filmTitle,
extract(year from return_date) as year,
sum(amount) over(partition by title, extract(year from return_date)) as totAmntYear,
sum(amount) over(partition by title order by extract(year from return_date)) as totAmntThisAndPrevYear
from payment 
join rental on payment.rental_id = rental.rental_id
right join inventory on rental.inventory_id = inventory.inventory_id
right join film on film.film_id = inventory.film_id
where fulltext @@ to_TSQuery('empir | happi')
group by year, filmTitle, amount, return_date
```

82907.content:
@kivu#82854 

Imala takav, ovo mi je radilo:
```
CREATE TEMP TABLE cats
(categoryname varchar(25));
INSERT INTO cats VALUES ( 'Comedy');
INSERT INTO cats VALUES ( 'Horror');
INSERT INTO cats VALUES ( 'Sports');

SELECT *
FROM crosstab($$SELECT last_name as employee, category.name AS cat, COUNT(*)
FROM staff RIGHT JOIN rental USING(staff_id) LEFT JOIN inventory USING(inventory_id)
              LEFT JOIN film USING(film_id) LEFT JOIN film_category USING(film_id) LEFT JOIN category USING(category_id)
WHERE category.name IN ('Comedy', 'Horror', 'Sports') AND (to_TSVector('english', film.title) @@ to_TSQuery('english', 'empir | shark')
                                                           OR to_TSVector('english', film.description) @@ to_TSQuery('english', 'empir | shark'))
GROUP BY staff_id, cat, staff.last_name
ORDER BY employee, cat$$, 'SELECT categoryname FROM cats ORDER BY categoryname')
AS pivotTable (employee VARCHAR(45), comedy VARCHAR(25), horror VARCHAR(25), sports VARCHAR(25))
ORDER BY employee
```

82957.content:
Evo mo쬯a nekome pomogne kod do kojeg sam do코o prije odstajanja.

```sql
CREATE TEMP TABLE country_categories (country_category text);
INSERT INTO country_categories VALUES ('China'), ('India'), ('Italy');

SELECT * FROM crosstab('SELECT film.title, country, COUNT(*)
FROM rental NATURAL JOIN customer NATURAL JOIN address NATURAL JOIN city
NATURAL JOIN country NATURAL JOIN inventory NATURAL JOIN film
WHERE to_tsvector(film.title) @@ to_tsquery(''english'', ''shark | explor'')
OR to_tsvector(film.description) @@ to_tsquery(''english'', ''shark | explor'')
AND country IN (''China'', ''India'', ''Italy'')
GROUP BY film.title, country.country', 'SELECT country_category as country from country_categories')
AS pivottable(title varchar(255), china int, india int, italy int)
```

83046.content:
![](assets/2020-10-22/00001.png)

Evo za sljede캖u generaciju.
```
CREATE TEMP TABLE country_categories (country_category text);
INSERT INTO country_categories VALUES ('China'), ('India'), ('Italy');

SELECT * FROM crosstab('SELECT film.title, country, COUNT(*)
FROM rental INNER JOIN customer ON rental.customer_id = customer.customer_id
INNER JOIN address ON customer.address_id = address.address_id
INNER JOIN city ON address.city_id = city.city_id
INNER JOIN country ON city.country_id = country.country_id
INNER JOIN inventory ON rental.inventory_id = inventory.inventory_id
INNER JOIN film ON inventory.film_id = film.film_id
WHERE to_tsvector(film.title) @@ to_tsquery(''english'', ''shark | explor'')
OR to_tsvector(film.description) @@ to_tsquery(''english'', ''shark | explor'')
AND country IN (''China'', ''India'', ''Italy'')
GROUP BY film.title, country.country', 'SELECT country_category as country from country_categories')
AS pivottable(title varchar(255), china int, india int, italy int)
```
